src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Dwoada, Sara Danius, a ɔyɛ daadaa ɔkyerɛwfo ɛwɔ Noble kuo ɛma Literekya ɛwɔ Swedish Akadɛmi, kaa no baguam wɔ Sveriges Radio dwumadi wɔ Sweden kuo mu so sɛ, ne nsa anka Bob Dylan tee de Noble abasobɔde a ne nsa kae wɔ afe 2016 wɔ Literekya no mu, na mmɔden a ɔrebɔ sɛ ne nsa bɛka no ɔde ato baabi.
hyp_text: Wɔyɛɛ dɛn, Sara Danius, sɛnkyerɛnnyi wɔn a ɛwɔ Nobel Abɛdɛm wɔ Literatüre mu, sɛnkyerɛnnyi wɔn a ɛwɔ Sveriges Abɛdɛm mu, ɔhene bi a wɔn ne Bob Dylan akyɛ akyɛ, ne 2016 Nobel Abɛdɛm wɔ Literatüre mu, sɛnkyerɛnnyi wɔn a ɛwɔn.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: Glen Cushing a ɔwɔ United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Kuo na ɛwɔ Northern Arizona Suapɔn mu wɔ l Flagstaff, Arizona kaa sɛ; “Wɔn thermal no su nsesa te abodan akɛse wɔ asase so a daa ne tɛmperekya no gyina faako, nanso ɛne no hyia wɔ ntokuro akɛse a ɛwɔ fam no” .
hyp_text: Wɔn ɛnɛma atraɛ ho de sɛn biara atraɛn a ɛnɛma biara a ɛwɔ atraɛn atraɛn biara a ɛwɔ, na ɛnɛma no biara atraɛn atraɛn biara a ɛwɔ, na ɛnɛma no biara atraɛn atraɛn biara a ɛwɔ, na ɛnɛma no biara atraɛn atraɛn biara a ɛwɔ, na ɛnɛma no biara atraɛn atraɛn biara a ɛwɔ.
